website_summaries.verdict: You get 3 efficient fire starters with this purchase.
pros: Striking tool includes a bottle opener
Magnesium scrapes off easily and strikes efficiently
cons: The chain that comes with this kit is not very long, and is actually 3 small chains linked together

customer_reviews.title: Glued together
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to recieve my order fast but when I opened it up i found two of the strikers were stuck together and wouldn't come apart which sucks so I guess I only have one good striker I heard a lot of good stuff about it and maybe I got a defective unit but It really bummed me out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Friendly Swede Indeed !
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to see these on Amazon! I was also very impressed with the construction and everything that came with them especially for the price. I gave these out as Christmas gifts this year and I want to buy some more to have around. I thought the stickers were really cool as well especially since I am a huge Volvo collector so the stickers are going on my Volvos :) . The good old Swedish moose.
customer_reviews.author: JeeperJA

customer_reviews.title: this is much better than the cheap Chinese imports
customer_reviews.text: this is much better than the cheap Chinese imports, and at least the equal to my original milsurp Doan, with a much better striker.The import one provides you with a bit of hacksaw blade, and the military one wants you to use your knife! The friendly swede fire starter has an excellent striker too, with a built in bottle opener to help celebrate after you build your fire! Just be sure to wipe the striker off with alcohol and scrape the side opposite from the flint bar free of paint or oil before you go in the woods. When you scrape the magnesium bar for fire starting keep your pile of shavings directly under your tinder. Enjoy the outdoors!
customer_reviews.author: Will and Eva J.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: The Item: Absolutely fantastic piece of gear for camping. The magnesium flakes well, it lights perfectly, and stores well with chain attached flint. Fits in the palm of your hand and weighs practically nothing. Customer Service: The company sent a confirmation email alerting that the item had shipped, and stressed that if there was ANYTHING unsatisfactory we were to contact them immediately, and they's "make it right." I get the feeling that few people need to do this, because judging by the high quality of this item I suspect it's that way across the board for their merchandise.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy (Tbone) Schoenle

customer_reviews.title: Good deal on a necessary item
customer_reviews.text: Good deal on a necessary item. If you'd rather depend on lighters that break or run out of fuel; or matches that blow out if someone farts within 50 yards of 'em, then go that route. I'd rather be able to make my own fire, anytime, any place. A little dried moose poop and one of these mag strikers, and you'll be dining on roasted rabbits & lizards in no time at all. These should be in every home & bug out bag. And if you're smarter than magnesium, you can learn to use them properly in short order. This 3pk is a good buy. Get 'em....
customer_reviews.author: Idaho Dave

customer_reviews.title: Not for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Even though it works fine and will propably last long, its not for beginners. I watched lots of videos and did my research, I put a lot of practice. But speaking to other more experience camper I found out that its not easy. The sparks of these 3 are quite small compared to bigger strikers. I think the advertisment is a bit shown too easy and not quite true.
customer_reviews.author: Lissy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: In spite of the great reviews by others I found this product to be very disappointing. The magnesium would not ignite regardless of the method I tried. The supplier sent me a replacement which didn't work either. I don't know if I received a bad product or this is the norm but it didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Where there's smoke, there's fire........
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to put in my bug out bag. I have not personally used them but from handling them, they seem like a pretty good product. Also, received an email form the seller to let me know if i'm not completely satisfied to let them know. So, this is a plus that they follow-up after the sale. I will at some point try them out to make sure they do the job, but have not had the chance as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley A. Helms

customer_reviews.title: THIS WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value! Many of the fire starters on Amazon SAY they have magnesium, but do not, being just sparking devices. This product comes with very substantial magnesium blocks you scrape shavings from to start even soggy tinder. You must scrape the black finish off the portion of the mag block you're scraping AND remove the black coating from a side of the steel scraper too, or it won't spark. These come coated to avoid oxidization of both the mag block and the scraping tool so, if you try to use it without wearing away the coatings, you're just rubbing painted surfaces together. Going to buy another set for our daughter and son-in-law.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my husband as part of a survival kit. Product came 3 to a box with adjustable chains for each. It feels and looks of quality. Ferro sparks easily with striker and magnesium scrapes smoothly. Hubby was highly pleased with this item. I think he might have even giggled like a little boy, lol!
customer_reviews.author: illumminata

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say how they’ll hold up but I’m very satisfied with my purchase... They arrived quickly and do exactly what they are supposed to... I had purchased some other magnesium firestarters on Amazon and was disappointed . The magnesium on the other products did not catch fire as magnesium should... I didn’t have that problem with these the magnesium and flint did exactly as they should .. I also like the extra long chain with them you don’t have to take the tool off to scrape the magnesium or slide the flint , which on other brands you do ... the tool for scraping is decent as well, not flimsy at all ... Im satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Terri garofolo

customer_reviews.title: Makes great fire.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe how easy it was to make fire. Scrape some of the magnesium. Remove the light coating on the ferro rod and one strike with the spine of my Lionsteel m4 (note: it doesn’t come with 90* spine) and bam. Fire! Really surprised me. It’s even better than your standard ferro rod. The little ferro rod that comes embedded in it is very deceptive. Never in a million years that I thought it would light it from a simple singular strike. This will last me ages I think. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it does what it is suppose to do. Makes sparks. I cant speak to longevity, as I just recently acquired them. I feel by the small amount of magnesium needed to start a fire, and the fact that I will not use these to make a fire every day, it should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Waterdog

customer_reviews.title: Great product...works!
customer_reviews.text: My second order. They're great. Well made and worth every penny. My only and tiny complaint is the beaded chain included to help hold the components together and maybe attach to something. I've not had one break yet...haven't been rough on them...but have this gnawing lack of confidence in beaded chains.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bozarth

customer_reviews.title: Lighting up my life
customer_reviews.text: These were the best deal I found for a top rated striker of this style. There is plenty of magnesium to shave off for tinder and the rod responds to the striker nicely. The ball chain is plenty long to use the striker without taking it off the chain. Need tinder? I save my dryer lint. Works great and it's free!
customer_reviews.author: B.T.S.Top Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: These thing work great
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Used it one night when we were camping and it had been raining all day. There was a break in the rain and I used some of the magnesium with some damp pinestraw and got it to light right up. After that I used a drinking straw so I could blow air at the heart of the flame we had and in no time I had a full blaze going.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Marshall Jr.

customer_reviews.title: much better than the (not to be named) big name ones ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought product to get the strikers for custom handled Ferro-rods I make. Discovered that the magnesium blocks are of high quality also and much, much better than the (not to be named) big name ones found in most stores camping section. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Not RichChuckard

customer_reviews.title: Great product; I initially tried it out in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product; I initially tried it out in my fireplace. Took a few strikes, but I was able to pick up the technique (if there is one). Great for camping without having to worry about wet matches. I can't wait for the next season to try to this out.
customer_reviews.author: Basil

customer_reviews.title: They work fine
customer_reviews.text: The magnesium fire starters arrived quickly and were nicely packaged. The strikers even have a bottle opener notch. If course I wanted to see if they worked like the big name brand. The block shaves easily and a couple strikes with the included ferro rod got a nice flame. So good to go. Oh, compared to the name brand they are slightly wider. Thickness and length are the same.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K

customer_reviews.title: Great firestarter
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite magnesium fire starter. Perfect size for putting in a pocket or emergency kit or using when camping and uses the good magnesium not the barely flammable junk you find in knockoffs. In extremely wet conditions sprinkle the magnesium throughout the tinder pile for a guaranteed light.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Harm

customer_reviews.title: Great for impressing your friends while camping!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works, and even a dunderhead like me can get a fire going in no time. As a bonus, it makes you look like Bear Grylls when you are camping with your friends. I've had mine for two years and have only just made a dent in the first magnesium block, so this stuff will last you a while. The magnesium scraper isn't the best, but you can make it work with some effort, or just use a knife. I also found the striker to be very easy to use once you get the technique down. I found that a flicking motion works better than a dragging one.
customer_reviews.author: Friday

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a very fair price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many of these over the years and all have preformed excellently every time. I keep one in all my vehicles, bags, buildings and so on. I just purchased some more for other family members. I would highly recommend these to anyone who wants to get the fire going quickly so that you can spend more time enjoying your time outdoors. I would also like to say that I have no affiliation with the company in anyway.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, typical of the Swede.
customer_reviews.text: I've got a couple of mag/steel fire starters, but these Friendly Swede mag/ steel lighters have already proved to be the best. Good heavy spark off the steel, quick flame from the mag shavings. The chain is three times longer than what you usually receive with this type of fire starter. The striker is not just a cut off sawblade, but is heavier and has some thought put into it's design The price is great, but most of all this type of fire starter is great to have around, just in case. It also would be a great stocking stuffer for the kids/ grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow -- Everybody loves these things!
customer_reviews.text: Between my son (scout) and I, we've had a couple of the other, plainer magnesium block fire starters, which work fine. I ordered these when I started putting together a 'get home' bag to carry in my car. This product is an order of magnitude better than my other ones (improved scraper and the cool coating and the surprisingly long chains). I am impressed. One's going in the car kit, one in the bug-out bag, the third in my 'normal' camping gear for other emergencies. These combined with petroleum jelly-impregnated cotton balls will start a fire in almost any conditions. Worth every penny and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Paleobrony

customer_reviews.title: Once mastered they work very well.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to teach cub scouts how to start a fire without matches. It takes some practice but they were able to light some dryer lint with some effort. Once you master the technique they work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Walter61

customer_reviews.title: Worthy addition to your gear
customer_reviews.text: Shaves off easy. Great spark. Very light weight and easy to pack. Using magnesium can be tricky, you have to have a good mix of fiber shavings and a bit larger ones, along with good kindling of your choosing. Still a better deal than bags of shavings.
customer_reviews.author: Ben B.

customer_reviews.title: Long chain
customer_reviews.text: Lots of chain, each of the three units had this much chain. I did not have to wipe off oil, it was ready to go. Two thumbs up for the striker design. Mailbox delivery to fire started, probably less than 10 minutes! These work great for throwing sparks and of course, the magnesium supply works as intended. A nice quality improvement over the $1.99 item from the import tool company.
customer_reviews.author: Selective Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived prompt. I love the friendly swede stickers (not at all relevant to this product). A good idea to practice but it gave off a much more consistent and brighter spark than the other spark stick that I bought along with these. I'll give it 5 stars if and when I can successfully start a fire with them.
customer_reviews.author: MongrelRaider

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great to have in an emergency or while out camping when it's too windy or wet for a lighter or matches. They can get a fire going really easily due to the magnesium and flint all in one handy unit. It really produces a lot of sparks and the magnesium catches fire quickly. I like that it's a three pack with three strikers and chains and fit in my pocket or backpack and do not take up any room. Really pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: A larger, brighter spark, above all else!
customer_reviews.text: The best magnesium flint on the market. I use the Friendly Swede's magnesium fire starter above all else. It produces a significantly larger, brighter spark than the other 3 types I compared alongside it. I camp many times a year and use The Friendly Swede above all else for my fire starting needs.
customer_reviews.author: D Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to use and was a suitable backup plan when the bow did not work. Lots of sparks and when set to some good tinder produced a good flame that got the fire going quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: They work ok, but not any better than a different brand that I bought at Walmart. The magnesium shavings don't burn very well. And the stone that sparks wears down very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: daveroller

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. Handy tool!
customer_reviews.text: I actually got to practice with this while camping this summer! Built my first fire with it. The size and ease of handling was just right and I like the connection chain. And it does what it says it does.
customer_reviews.author: SongBird

customer_reviews.title: Higly impressed and reccomend these
customer_reviews.text: I must say these impressed me...for being Made in China bars, great price point and a 3 pack..I've used legit Doan bars for years and love them. These are honestly just as good and i love the longer chain for the bar. I highly recommend these, great shipping, very friendly service and working product. Took me about 5 minutes to scrape off the coating, get some shavings on a dryer sheet and strike! Bazinga I had fire! Long as the quality of the bar is the same, i will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Bax

customer_reviews.title: Even my girlfriend can start a fire with this
customer_reviews.text: The shaver/striker bit is much nicer than on other magnesium fire starters I've owned. It shaves the filings off faster and makes more sparks than other brands. I guess the funny shape helps too, but it is mostly the thickness and sharpness of the thing, I think. I gave one to my girlfriend and she was able to start a fire right off, even though she's never successfully started a fire from a spark before today.
customer_reviews.author: Keith J. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Buy the standard set up
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get the carbide to spark with knife blade unable to spark with supplied scraper pretty but less useful than standard carbide rod and magnesium block Go with the original
customer_reviews.author: Mark Tuccillo

customer_reviews.title: I love the Friendly Swede!
customer_reviews.text: These are nice little firestarters. A little small, but they throw a decent amount of sparks. Built-in magnesium is a nice touch. Better safe than sorry! And you get three of them. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Scratch

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased these twice now - yes, it will take some work to shave enough for starting a fire - should it be your "primary" fire option - no - but it certainly has a place in your backpack. Have used the Doan magnesium block for many, many years - thought I'd try this one. I am impressed with the company communication and think this is a useful product for BOB, Hiking or Camping. Think of it as your backup.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again. These are great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality, these are the best flint fire starters I have bought so far. They were well packaged and came with instructions on care and use which you won't usually get. Very satisfied with this product and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: xxeno

customer_reviews.title: Works very well, and helps you be prepared.
customer_reviews.text: I tried these out this weekend during Storm Helena. In a couple of minutes I had the proper angle for scraping the magnesium to build up a little pile of dust, and then the proper angle against the flint side to create a shower of sparks. The magnesium dust quickly caught the spark and flared up, and my tinder (small bits of wood) caught. The fireplace is roaring and I am nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Have had great results with these
customer_reviews.text: These work very well and are very easy to start fire. One of the ferro rods fell off the fuel block in shipping. Glued it back on with E6000, never had one do that in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly, better than Doan.
customer_reviews.text: I had heard that Doan magnesium fire starters were the best on the market but I decided to give these a try. I was pleasantly surprised when I tested them and they worked just as well if not better than the Doan's. Doan does not include a striker bar with their magnesium fire starters which is surprising. The Swede brand is not only three times cheaper, they also provide striker bars with each of their magnesium bars
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Works ok and you get 3
customer_reviews.text: Will work for starting fire. Played with one and the striker works fine for striking sparks but not so well for magnesium. Was able to start fire but flint wears quickly with heavy use. I recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not for the easily frustrated.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Just make sure to scrape at least a quarter sized pile of shavings, to few shavings it will never work. I also found the edge of my tool had a nice bure on it and works much better for scrapping and sparking. A knife or old hack saw blade work even better. I would not recommend this as a primary source for fire!! Buy a lighter... As far as magnesium alloy fire starters go it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: rod strikes great
customer_reviews.text: Rod throws sparks. I was able to start a fire easily. Seems durable and well made. Will update my review if I have any issues. I really like the three pack because i can throw one in my car and one in each of mine and my wife's BOBs.
customer_reviews.author: John doe

customer_reviews.title: Great Fire Starters.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these magnesium fire starters. Easy to shave the magnesium and the flint sparks great. I have one in each of my bugout bags and one in my edc bag. Good quality and great price. The only thing I didn't like was the little chains but no big deal I just used 550 paracord to put together. Would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Randy C

customer_reviews.title: Flipped our river jet in remote Alaska, this was ...
customer_reviews.text: Flipped our river jet in remote Alaska, this was one of the things I salvaged. Literally, may have been a life saver.. I wasn't sure why I got a 3 pack, but I did at the time I bought them. Now I have one, and each of the guys that was with me when we flipped have one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Price/Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Always have fire starting capability with the friendly Swede in your pocket. Plenty of magnesium shavings available which will help almost anyone start a fire when necessary. This product is inexpensive, lightweight, sturdy and will never, never fail you. I recommend both this product and this merchant highly. Easy to use camping and survival insurance; never go out into the wild without this product!
customer_reviews.author: Francis B. Morganti

customer_reviews.title: Patience/practice...
customer_reviews.text: I taught Survival techniques to military personnel for 20 years and probably wore out 4 or 5 of these during those years (not your brand but another). I'm a tad bit rusty (retired in 1986 after 20 years) but everything went as well as before, just took a little refreshing on my part.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the chains. Each chain is actually made of three smaller chains, so you can adjust the size.
customer_reviews.author: E&H Fleischer

customer_reviews.title: Get these if you need fire starters.
customer_reviews.text: While they are just magnesium fire starters, the ones from the Swede have extra ball chain sections which actually allow plenty of room to use the striker. A minor thing but an appreciated little extra. Saves me from having to buy more chain or improvise.Little extra features on the striker.
customer_reviews.author: Van N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product from a Great Company
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Love the companies moose logo. The black coating easily scratches off so the the magnesium can be shaved. Works great. Love that the striker can also be used as a can opener. The long ball chain to keep the striker with the block is also a very nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Brian McMillon

customer_reviews.title: Much better than a ferro rod alone
customer_reviews.text: These work really well. It's much easier to start a fire with the magnesium shavings versus just a ferro rod. My only complaint is that I wish the rod built into these starters was a couple mm wider in diameter. It looks like the mag block will outlast it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Diggie

customer_reviews.title: Good enough.
customer_reviews.text: Works the way it is supposed to. It could conceivably be better at shaving off the magnesium, but still, it was good enough. They work well enough that I've purchased a second set of these since trying the first set.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian G

customer_reviews.title: I have tried many fire starters and like these for the reliability
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many fire starters and like these for the reliability, effectiveness and reasonable price. What your want is something that will work. These definitely work and work well. The little striker is specially made to shave off the magnesium so you can create a little pile of it quickly and efficiently. Then the striker on the spark bar showers the pile with sparks. You can create a fine in any weather and without wondering. A great little survival must for your car, back pack and hiking gear. Light, compact and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Broker TEX

customer_reviews.title: When 2 is 1 and 1 is none, 3 is the right choice
customer_reviews.text: Picked these up to augment several bags I have, and did put each block through a quick "back yard test" upon arrival. As with all my purchases in the past from "The Friendly Swede", you can buy with confidence. Solid products, good prices, awesome service and shipping time. What's there to complain about?
customer_reviews.author: Alex Utroska

customer_reviews.title: 40 GM's of Magnesium.
customer_reviews.text: The ferroceramic rod throsles good sparks. The Magnesium burns very hot. I weighed the Magnesium block at 40 GM's. There is a small sparking rod on the Magnesium block.
customer_reviews.author: Alix Snodgrass

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Quick to light. I was able to easy get the shavings out and then start the fire with only a few strikes. I did not even have to use a lot of shavings. Some pocket lint with about 10-15 good strokes of shavings then in about 3-5 strikes of the rod we had a nice fire started
customer_reviews.author: Urduja

customer_reviews.title: Best I've used so far
customer_reviews.text: Worked swell first time out of the box. Striker is good, and I love the fact that the retention chain is long enough to use the striker without disconnecting, dropping, losing, etc. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PinstriperTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price.
customer_reviews.text: Was able to promptly start a fire with little fuss on the first try. The magnesium bar seems to be easier to shave than another brand I have used. Price was great and super Amazon delivery service. You can't go wrong with this fire starter.
customer_reviews.author: ABO-Rh, Texas

customer_reviews.title: A very small amount of fine magnesium burned a hole through a paper plate real ...
customer_reviews.text: Between the three that is some serious Magnesium! The scrapers work OK, but you are removing metal with metal, so it is slow going. Everything you need in one package, the chains are even long enough to hang 'round your neck. A very small amount of fine magnesium burned a hole through a paper plate real nice. Glad I didn't use more, I was inside at the time. I had better luck removing the chain whilst using the unit.
customer_reviews.author: denny

customer_reviews.title: grear for webelos den meeting
customer_reviews.text: Great starter. Used them with our Webelos scout den when doing fire starting without a match. Many of the boys were successful! Product worked well and great customer service by Little Swede. Would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Sparking of different type.
customer_reviews.text: Nice equipment and will provide great fire starting capability. Should allow for many good starts. Excellent packaging and presentation of your product. Thank you for your efforts, will buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amz_zulu

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: After reading a bunch of reviews on other Magnesium fire starters I was dubious, because these seemed like a better deal than others. When theses arrived I tested all 3 bars, they worked great. the Scrapper is nice and much more usable than the piece off a saw blade blade you get with other ones. All in all , quality , usability these are as good if not better than much more expensive versions, AND 1000 % better than the cheep Chinese ones that don't even burn under direct flame.
customer_reviews.author: Tino

customer_reviews.title: High quality, long lasting magnesium fire starter!
customer_reviews.text: Product works as advertised. A considerable amount of effort went into both the packaging and presentation of the product and the quality of the magnesium block and striker is top notch. I'm sure that this 3 pack will last anyone, even an avid camper / backpacker a very long time. No need to look elsewhere for Swedish fire-steel, the "Friendly Swede" has what you need! :)
customer_reviews.author: TechReviews

customer_reviews.title: Great every day carry
customer_reviews.text: Great to carry in your pocket. Just be sure and file down the corners or they will wear a hole in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: walter crandall

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: Took some practice but I use this all the time for camp fires, grilling and other occasions I would normally use a lighter. Plus it's fairly child proof, which is good around the kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Fun for scouts
customer_reviews.text: Good price for Scout group to play around with. The long ferrosulfate rods are just much better. Kids loved trying the various firestarters and judging for themselves. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for what you get in the package
customer_reviews.text: Great value for what you get in the package. I tried it out today and found that overall it is of good quality, but I would like to have a more aggressive edge on the striker. What ends up happening is that the corners of the Magnesium get worn first and the center is left untouched. Some tweaks to the striker would make it the best thing out there. I would recommend this to anyone who wants a reliable starter for a solid price.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: These are great, simply put. In my opinion the new design certainly trumps the old, and the old worked fantastic on their own. I really like the new beefier striker handle with a couple simple tools built into it, and how the notched end piece carves the magnesium piece more effieciently. A+
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Manfrenjensenden

customer_reviews.title: Great product / value
customer_reviews.text: Product as advertised, arrived in good condition in timely fashion. I've always liked having a magnesium block/flint in my survival kits. With that I can almost always get a good fire even in wet conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Guy

customer_reviews.title: For Emergencies Only
customer_reviews.text: These work perfectly fine, Small, and Lightweight. Good product. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: MAG

customer_reviews.title: Handy to have for camping and emergencies.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item to have in your emergency kit as well as for camping. It is a great thing to have for Boy Scout outings and teaching the kids different ways to start a fire. This set was way better than other magnesium fire starters and I found that the kids were able to start a fire on the first try 95% of the time - the only scout that needed a second try did not follow directions the first time but had no problems the second time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them! :)
customer_reviews.text: These fire starters are great! They easily throw off a large amount of magnesium sparks. If you put some of the magnesium shavings on your tinder before lighting them with the sparks, you get a very quick ignition of the tinder and then twigs and then ultimately your logs or other material. Doesn't require any batteries or petroleum based fuel and they will probably last years to decades.
customer_reviews.author: Sorbe

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Nothing really needs to be said. They are exactly as described and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby  Hughes

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and easy everyday carry item in pocket or backpack
customer_reviews.text: The Sparks are flying! very well made product for the price, attention to details are obvious in the design especially in the blade with teeth to scrape off magnesium more aggressively, lightweight and easy everyday carry item in pocket or backpack. Plenty of sparks when used and blade is long enough to use with gloves on in cold weather
customer_reviews.author: JRL55

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Super good. Comes with three. High quality and easy to use to quickly make a fire.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick V.

customer_reviews.title: Easy fire for all circumstances.
customer_reviews.text: 3 for the price! I tested and they all work well. One in the car, one in the camping gear and one for the kayak. They are all treated with some type of oil so wipe off well before using.
customer_reviews.author: jason fulton

customer_reviews.title: Convenient little firestarter to hang on your pack
customer_reviews.text: Great scraping/beer opener tool - magnesium scrapes off easy and scored an easy spark
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tried one out and it did as its intended - will fit it my emergency supplies . Was contacted about the product by the company to thank me and make sure everything was alright , nice to see things like that happen ! Excellent product and great customer service !
customer_reviews.author: Guy Beeckman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is kind of fun to have. It works well and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Love the long chain
customer_reviews.text: The fire starters arrived within three days. The pictures do not do justice to the long chain they come with. The long length makes it possible to use the strikers with out taking them off the chain. Since there are three in a package I was able to put one with my backpacking gear, one in my car, and one with my fishing tackle.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used yet. However the quality is high. Great value for the money. Friendly seller communications
customer_reviews.author: EARL C SCOGGINS JR

customer_reviews.title: The Friendly Swede "Strikes" Again!
customer_reviews.text: As usual, the Friendly Swede "strikes" again with a high quality fire starter! The magnesium is soft and easy to get great shavings for rapid fire starting. It is very well made! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: JACKSON BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Good product and company
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly as described. It is high quality and works great. The company is serious about their name/brand. They are very friendly! I have been pleasantly surprised by their concern for my satisfaction. I would definitely buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Babb

customer_reviews.title: T hey are very sturdy and that was my concern
customer_reviews.text: We have not used them as yet since we are under fire restrictions. But they are very handy with the chains to connect to our preparedness pack so as not to lose.. T hey are very sturdy and that was my concern. Sorry that I cannot give more information but happy to see they are a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Lights up the darkness and takes away the dampness with this Magnesium fire starter, and it works great.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product it is just what the Friendly Swede calmed it would do, it will start a fire in a lot of different materials as long as you follow the instructions for doing this. Thanks Friendly Swede I would like to get some more of these for the rest of our family.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry G.

customer_reviews.title: Great mag bars. Just work.
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. Works in wet conditions when other methods fail. Very compact. Long lasting. Quick delivery. Best when used as s supplement with s nice big ferro rod, making s can’t miss kit.
customer_reviews.author: Shooter

customer_reviews.title: You bet your life!
customer_reviews.text: FAR more dependable then those crummy cheapo mag bar kits and the magnesium is protested with a black coating. Plenty of hot sparks to start your camp fire!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for 3 magnesium/flint fire starters
customer_reviews.text: Great price for 3 magnesium/flint fire starters. The scraper/sparkler blade works fine, but a basic knife is better. I always have a couple knives on me when I'm out in the woods anyways 8^)
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My 11 year old daughter started a fire with this in damp conditions. Neither of us had ever tried using a flint and steel before. Practically fool proof. I’m glad to have this in our camping/backpacking kit.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Son loves them.
customer_reviews.text: My son asked for these as a gift and loves them.
customer_reviews.author: C. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Complete.
customer_reviews.text: I've used magnesium fire starters before but this has been the most convenient. What I mean by that is that it comes as kit with the magnesium, the striker and scraper tool, and a chain to keep them together. Also the price is well worth it. This kit great for groups who need multiple strikers or if you have several bug out bags that you want to equip similarly. Either way, I recommend it for anyone who needs to start a fire in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and easy to use fire a fire starter when you leave your bic lighters at home accidently.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Westwood

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied about everything
customer_reviews.text: i will post pics later for the product i'm satisfied with everything the price is good and the quality is good also i will update this review when something come up to my head
customer_reviews.author: Susanoo Shield

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting fire starters
customer_reviews.text: The best fire starter around, the best part is when you start to use it, and notice it’s nearly impossible to just get trough one no matter how often you use it. Seconds after you notice you still have 2 more left. Also having magnesium around like that is perfect, can use it for any chemistry labs you may need it for❤️
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Gonzalez 333

customer_reviews.title: The Friendly Swede gives fast delivery of nicely packaged products followed up by friendly customer service
customer_reviews.text: Have been using magnesium firestarters since service in the 80s. These reliable bars and scraping tools will last years with the coating that has been applied to them. Buy these from The Friendly Swede with confidence. The Friendly Swede gives fast delivery of nicely packaged products followed up by friendly customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Kept one for myself, gave two as gifts.. I like the larger striker... Although, grabbing my firestarter would not *typically* be my first choice, if I needed to tighten/loosen a 1/4" hex nut!... The chains are really long!... Actually, each one is three, 7" chains linked together. You can take them apart for other uses!
customer_reviews.author: Vas

customer_reviews.title: Best I've used.
customer_reviews.text: Superior product and seller. The magnesium fire starter I bought from Harbor Freight was unusable it was so hard. This I soft enough that though you have to work at it (it is metal, after all) it is totally doable and the stuff actually works as it should. If I needed more I'd absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: work well
customer_reviews.text: they work, we tried them out right off. You do have to scrap the striker clean to get your spark so make sure to do that and you will have no problems. we have these all tucked up in our go bags.
customer_reviews.author: H Duhaime

product_meta.title: The Friendly Swede Magnesium Flint Fire Starter - 3 Pack - Survival Firesteel Blocks with Striker, Camping Emergency Equipment
feature_bullets: EASY FIRE STARTING: Your new magnesium fire starter kit makes it especially easy to throw sparks and start a fire. The Mag Bar works in any weather conditions - rain, snow, high-altitude. The fire lighters are suitable for camping, survival, bushcraft and other outdoor activities.
FIRST-STAGE TINDER IS BUILT-IN: The mag bar is your tinder, whereas a common fire starter requires separate material and it is not always easy to find something that will readily light.

EXTREMELY HOT SPARKS: The flint rod will throw hot sparks just as well, no matter how windy it is. The handy striker which also can be used as bottle opener makes this fire steel perfect both for experts and beginners.
LONGER LASTING, CONVENIENT AND COMPACT: You can start many (thousands) of fires with this bundle of 3 firesteel blocks with chains.

LIFETIME WARRANTY - RISK FREE SHOPPING: To back it all up, we are offering our Friendly Lifetime Warranty for this flint and steel. Our World Class customer service team is here for you every day of the year and happy to help answer ANY questions you may have within hours. Just copy-paste this link into your browser: http://amzn.to/1AmGlj8
